item.description:
Let's take a ferry boat ride to some of the Boston Harbor Islands.

Spectacle Island has jazz music from 12 noon to 3pm on Sundays. So, I thought we could check that out. We can also go to other islands, walk around on trails, eat lunch, fly a kite, toss a frisbie, etc ....

The ticket kiosk is located adjacent to the Marriott Long Wharf Hotel and Christopher Columbus Park. It's near Tia's and Starbuck's.

The ferry leaves at 11am sharp! So, we'll meet between 10am to 10:30am at the ticket kiosk. Please give yourself extra time to find the ticket kiosk. Look for me near the kiosk. I'll hold a sign.

Suggestions to bring: camera, sunscreen, lunch, water, snacks, comfortable walking shoes, kite, frisbie and whatever else you can think of. :-)

Ticket price is $12.

The closest T is the blue line to the Aquarium.

Check out their website for more info:

http://www.bostonisla...

Cheers!

Lisa

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Ferry Boat Ride to Boston Harbor Islands
